name: You can't do it alone (Maim)
description:
A factory in a cave, who thought of that idea!? Get a friend to help you out and power your way out of there.

Controls:

  • Power Orb (Hold Left Mouse to control the orb) // you'll need this to walk
  • WASD (Directional walking)

Multiplayer:

The game is multiplayer, and I will be hosting it for a week after the contest is over. If you're from the future and the game isn't working, that is likely the reason why. It's probably very easy to hack as well, so please don't :)

Note:

My idea for this project was to create a factory with power and main section (that required power, whichs meant you would need more people to handle the factory), but due to limitation of time I was only able to finish the power part, and  the game will likely feel lacking.

This is my second game jam, and I use them as a learning experience, this time I wanted to attempt to create my first multiplayer game, and it was harder than I thought it would be. It's not perfect.
